cfallin commented on Issue #1697:

@Y-Nak -- do you think you'll be updating this within the next day or two? I'm happy to adopt it and get it reviewed/merged otherwise! I don't mean to apply too much pressure, I just want to get it closed somewhat soon as it's a fuzzbug that may be blocking some further fuzzing coverage :-) Either way is fine, just let us know!

Y-Nak commented on Issue #1697:

@cfallin Oh, I'm sorry. I just finished fixing it now.

Y-Nak commented on Issue #1697:

Changes

  • Add Function::rewrite_branch_destination method.
  • Remove the encodings from the test.
